#[[++

Copyright (C) 2019 bastynator

All rights reserved.

This file has been generated by the Automatic Component Toolkit (ACT) version 1.4.0.

Abstract: This is an autogenerated CMakeLists file for the development of Ray Marching Library.

Interface version: 0.9.0


]]

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5)

### The implementation of the Ray Marching Library component
project(raymarching)

set (CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)

include_directories(source)
# The location of autogenerated interfaces
set(CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/interface)

file(GLOB LIBRAYMARCHING_SRC
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/source/*.cpp
)
file(GLOB LIBRAYMARCHING_STUB
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stub/*.cpp
)

set(LIBRAYMARCHING_SRC ${LIBRAYMARCHING_SRC} ${LIBRAYMARCHING_STUB}
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR}/libraymarching_interfaceexception.cpp
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR}/libraymarching_interfacewrapper.cpp
)

add_library(raymarching SHARED ${LIBRAYMARCHING_SRC})
# The following two properties are crucial to reduce the number of undesirably exported symbols
set_target_properties(raymarching PROPERTIES CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden)
set_target_properties(raymarching PROPERTIES VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN ON)
# This makes sure symbols are exported
target_compile_options(raymarching PRIVATE "-D__LIBRAYMARCHING_EXPORTS")
target_include_directories(raymarching PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_AUTOGENERATED_DIR})
target_include_directories(raymarching PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stub)
